column2: April 30]], [[1941]]) is an English actor. His best known role was that of Chief Inspector Barney Crozier in ''[[wikipedia:Bergerac (TV series)
column3: Bergerac]]''. In [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column4: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], he played the part of [[Odo Proudfoot]].
